sections.heading: State
sections.text:
business license required; application and fee for license; activities

constituting conduct of business.

sections.heading: Certain
sections.text: manufacturers not required to obtain state business license.

sections.heading: Penalty
sections.text: for failing to obtain state business license before conducting business.

sections.heading: Limitation
sections.text: on number of state business licenses natural person is required to obtain.

sections.heading: Annual
sections.text:
renewal of state business license: Fee; notice; penalty for late payment;

waiver of fees and penalties.

sections.heading: Deposit
sections.text: of proceeds in State General Fund.

sections.heading: Confidentiality
sections.text: of records and files of Secretary of State.

sections.heading: Enforcement
sections.text:
of provisions: Revocation or suspension of state business license; denial of new

license.

sections.heading: Suspension
sections.text:
of state business license for failure to comply with controlling health

standards; notice of suspension. [Repealed.]

sections.heading: Suspension
sections.text: of state business license for owing debt to certain agencies.

sections.heading: Mandatory
sections.text:
suspension of state business license for failure to pay child support or comply

with certain subpoenas or warrants; reinstatement. [Effective until the date of

the repeal of 42 U.S.C. � 666, the federal law requiring each state to

establish procedures for withholding, suspending and restricting the

professional, occupational and recreational licenses for child support

arrearages and for noncompliance with certain processes relating to paternity

or child support proceedings.]

sections.heading: Penalty
sections.text:
for willfully failing or neglecting to obtain or renew state business license;

enforcement; regulations.
